sourcesContent: import React from "react"; import { Box, Typography } from "@mui/material"; const AboutUs = () => { return ( {/* Foto personal */} {/* Biografía */} About Us Hi, I’m Pablo, the founder and driving force behind this record store project. Music has always been at the core of my life — from years as a sound designer and collector, to building a community through Allmyrecords & Discogs. Over time, I’ve combined this passion with technology, transitioning into web development and front-end design. This project is more than just an e-commerce demo — it’s a space where my two worlds meet: the love for vinyl records and the creative possibilities of coding. Every detail you see here is guided by the idea of making music discovery and collecting meaningful, simple, and inspiring. Thanks for stopping by and sharing a piece of this journey. Whether you’re a passionate collector or just curious about records, I hope you enjoy exploring this project as much as I enjoyed creating it. ); }; export default AboutUs;
